titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to simplify and rename the H-2C worker program, and for other purposes.
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to simplify and rename the H-2C worker program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
